visualization_explanation: This visualization employs a choropleth map structure with two key variables: geographic regions (nominal data type) and reseller presence (binary categorical). The synthetic dataset generated by returnData() contains ISO country codes linked to reseller availability, maintaining domain consistency through valid country-code mappings. Color encoding follows Tufte's principles by using low-saturation base colors (#8383A1) to minimize visual noise, while hover states (#BADA55) create clear affordances for interaction. The tooltip design adheres to Cairo's emphasis on actionable perception by making reseller links immediately clickable. Map navigation controls preserve data-ink ratio by only appearing on interaction, and the high-resolution base map ensures topological accuracy without distracting map features.
